title: The Delightful but unfortunate Father Keith Nink and his extraordinary day of darkness
creator_credit: Mark Hanlin and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Relates the ordeal and ascension of Father Nink, a bibulous priest who becomes trapped in an unyielding fridge.
